Package index

Main function

px()
Create a px object

Create files

px_save()
Save px object to file
px_save_classification()
Save classification as .vs and .agg files

Modify px object

Once a px object has been created, with px(), it can be modified with the functions below

px Keywords

Modifying functions that match a specific px keyword.

px_aggregallowed()
AGGREGALLOWED
px_autopen()
AUTOPEN
px_axis_version()
AXIS-VERSION
px_baseperiod()
BASEPERIOD
px_cellnote()
CELLNOTE
px_cellnotex()
CELLNOTEX
px_cfprices()
CFPRICES
px_charset()
CHARSET
px_codepage()
CODEPAGE
px_confidential()
CONFIDENTIAL
px_contact()
CONTACT
px_contents()
CONTENTS
px_contvariable()
CONTVARIABLE
px_copyright()
COPYRIGHT
px_creation_date()
CREATION-DATE
px_data()
DATA
px_decimals()
DECIMALS
px_description()
DESCRIPTION
px_descriptiondefault()
DESCRIPTIONDEFAULT
px_domain()
DOMAIN
px_elimination()
ELIMINATION
px_heading()
HEADING
px_infofile()
INFOFILE
px_language()
LANGUAGE
px_languages()
LANGUAGES
px_last_updated()
LAST-UPDATED
px_link()
LINK
px_map()
MAP
px_matrix()
MATRIX
px_next_update()
NEXT-UPDATE
px_note()
NOTE
px_notex()
NOTEX
px_precision()
PRECISION
px_showdecimals()
SHOWDECIMALS
px_source()
SOURCE
px_stockfa()
STOCKFA
px_stub()
STUB
px_subject_area()
SUBJECT-AREA
px_subject_code()
SUBJECT-CODE
px_tableid()
TABLEID
px_timeval()
TIMEVAL
px_title()
TITLE
px_units()
UNITS
px_update_frequency()
UPDATE-FREQUENCY
px_valuenote()
VALUENOTE
px_valuenotex()
VALUENOTEX
px_values()
VALUES
px_variable_type()
VARIABLE-TYPE

Special modifying functions

Modifying functions that do not relate to a specific px keyword.

px_add_totals()
Add total levels to variables
px_figures()
Change figures variable
px_order()
Change value order
px_variable_label()
Change VARIABLE-LABEL

Special functions

px_micro()
Create micro PX-files
px_validate()
Check px object

Collections (value set and aggregations)

px_classification()
Create a classification object
px_save_classification()
Save classification as .vs and .agg files
